document_name: Minutes of the Project Board Meeting_June 2012
Minutes of the Project Board Meeting_December 2011
Minutes of the Project Board Meeting_December 2012

outputs.output_descr:
The main goal of the proposed project is to enhance social partnership in the employment and social protection of population with focus on vulnerable women and persons with disabilities. 
The goal will be achieved through the implementation of the following project components: 1) strengthening social partnership in promotion of employment and social protection at policy level (mainstream employment); 2) increasing employment opportunities and access to social services for vulnerable women and persons with disabilities at community level through involvement of NGOs (supported and sheltered employment).
